Asynchronous Request Processing

  • Synchronous Request Processing (ë™ê¸° ìš”ì²­ ì²˜ë¦¬)
    • T1: Request 1 ë„ì°©, ì‹¤í–‰
    • T2: Request 2 ë„ì°©

    • T4: Request 2 ì™„ë£Œ
  • Asynchronous Request Processing
    • T1: Request 1 ë„ì°©, ì‹¤í–‰

Callback Function

  • ë¹„ë™ê¸° ì‘ì—…(Asynchronous operation)ì´ ì™„ë£Œë˜ì—ˆì„ ë•Œ í˜¸ì¶œë˜ëŠ” í•¨ìˆ˜(Function)
  • ë¹„ë™ê¸° ì‘ì—… ê°„ ìˆœì„œ ê´€ê³„ë¥¼ ë³´ì¥í•¨
const fs = require('fs');

// íŒŒì¼ì„ ë¹„ë™ê¸°ë¡œ ì½ê¸°
fs.readFile('example.txt', 'utf-8', (err, data) => {
  if (err) {
    console.error(err);
    return;
  }
  console.log(data);
});
